oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Sons of the Pioneers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This recording is of songs performed by the Sons of the Pioneers. The box includes a handwritten song list on Hank Snow letterhead. The tape is the thirteenth of an unidentified number of tapes.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Sons of the Pioneers;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Blow, Wind Blow (Sons of the Pioneers) -- (02:22) Annie Laurie (Sons of the Pioneers) -- (04:27) Rocky Mountain Express (Sons of the Pioneers) -- (06:16) Don Juan (Sons of the Pioneers) -- (09:02) He's Ridin' Home (Sons of the Pioneers) -- (11:38) Unidentified Spanish song (Sons of the Pioneers) -- (14:15) Cactus Swing (Sons of the Pioneers) -- (16:27) Too High Too Wide Too Low (Sons of the Pioneers) -- (18:11) When I Leave This World Behind (Sons of the Pioneers) -- (21:01) Lead Me Gently Home, Father (Sons of the Pioneers) -- (23:23) Howlin' Pup (Sons of the Pioneers) -- (24:58) Bluin' the Blues (Sons of the Pioneers) -- (26:23) Chant of the Wanderer (Sons of the Pioneers)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Sons of the Pioneers;
